quest.name: Too Many Nutters
journal: Halldor believes you are ready to take an important step.

dialogue.name: HALLDOR
dialogue.text: There shehe is! The star hunter of Clan Nutsy herselfhimself! Bagged yourself a goodly number of three-nut marks, have we?

dialogue.name: HALLDOR
dialogue.text: But it's not enough, is it? Don't deny it. Nay, you need to experience it all: the terrifying lows, the dizzying highs, the creamy middles! And they need it too, if not more─why else would those Eulmoran bastards offer bigger and bigger bounties?

dialogue.name: HALLDOR
dialogue.text: They're waiting for you to slip up, just once. To give them a spectacular death. But you won't go quietly, oh no─you'll bleed them for every last gil and then some!

dialogue.name: HALLDOR
dialogue.text: And soon you'll have the chance to do so on an entirely different scale. How, you ask? By slaying elite marks, that's how!

dialogue.name: HALLDOR
dialogue.text: They're like nothing you've ever faced before. Wild and unpredictable, possessed of surpassing strength and guile. Many are the men who have left to slay such fiends, never to return.

dialogue.name: HALLDOR
dialogue.text: But their failures will only serve to season the dish that is your victory! The greater the risk, the greater the reward─extrinsic and intrinsic, no? Which is why you must speak with Xylle without further delay!

dialogue.name: XYLLE
dialogue.text: Oh, it's you. Come to beg permission to hunt elite marks?

dialogue.name: XYLLE
dialogue.text: That I cannot grant. Just the other day our very own leader fell in battle with such a beast. Torn to shreds and devoured─nary a trace remained to be buried.

dialogue.name: XYLLE
dialogue.text: I cannot in good conscience allow one of our most promising hunters to throw their life away as he did. For now, I must insist that you content yourself with the three-nut marks...

dialogue.name: NUTS
dialogue.text: (-???-)Now wait just a gosh-darned minute!

dialogue.name: XYLLE
dialogue.text: Wicked white! But you're─

dialogue.name: NUTS
dialogue.text: Nutsy, your fearless leader! Still alive and kupoing, I'll have you know!

dialogue.name: XYLLE
dialogue.text: But Halldor described in exacting detail how the beast snatched you out of the air─how as you struggled to free yourself in vain you were disemboweled and depommed─

dialogue.name: NUTS
dialogue.text: C-Certainly not! As you can see, I am the picture of perfect health, kupo!

dialogue.name: NUTS
dialogue.text: No thanks to that villain Halldor, though! I'd say he was the aspiring depommer, considering how many times he nearly chopped it off in the midst of our battle with that elite mark.

dialogue.name: XYLLE
dialogue.text: I rather think you have only yourself to blame for that. After all, was it not you who encouraged him and the others to strike you down and claim leadership?

dialogue.name: NUTS
dialogue.text: Aye, aye, for the thrill of it! Which he gave me and then some─even if only by his poor attempts at treachery. That weakling wouldn't last a moment against me in a stand-up fight!

dialogue.name: XYLLE
dialogue.text: As you may have gathered, it takes a certain...character to rise within the highest echelons of the clan.

dialogue.name: NUTS
dialogue.text: You've got to eat, sleep, and breathe danger! You've got to love putting it all on the line against elite marks and elite hunters besides! You've got to be bloody mad! So congratulations, Forename: you're in!

dialogue.name: XYLLE
dialogue.text: Are you sure this is wise?

dialogue.name: NUTS
dialogue.text: Wise, shmise! SheHe's a killer─I want to see herhim kill! I wanna see herhim die! Mwahahaha! More blood for Clan Nutsy! More blood, kupo!

dialogue.name: XYLLE
dialogue.text: It's that ridiculous philosophy that's losing us hunters by the boatload! How are we supposed to build a sustainable organization when you keep encouraging people to kill themselves in the most violent and pointless ways possible!?

dialogue.name: NUTS
dialogue.text: I─ Er. Well, you see... The thing is...

dialogue.name: NUTS
dialogue.text: Ahem! I just wanted to say that you may be the most promising new hunter I've seen in ages! Brilliant work out there, really marvelous. Jolly good! And on that note... Good-bye!

dialogue.name: XYLLE
dialogue.text: One day I'm going to rip that pom off your head and shove it down your godsdamned throat, you furry little shite...

dialogue.name: XYLLE
dialogue.text: Anyway, you may now hunt elite marks. Do try not to die. And, if you happen to run into our fearless leader in the field, kill him.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: You are now permitted to take bills for elite Clan Nutsy marks from the Clan Hunt board.

dialogue.name: HALLDOR
dialogue.text: Heh heh heh! Don't let me keep you, killer! There's a whole wide world of elite marks waiting for you to kill them! Hop to!

obj.n: How Do You Like Three Nuts
